CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 1, 1955, pg. 19, reads: "Walt Harper Returns - Pictured above is Walt Harper's orchestra which will open at the Crawford Grill Monday, Jan. 3. This date comes on the heels of Harper's successful college proms and one-nighter tours that took the band to major colleges in East.  Harper holds the house record at the Grill and his band is being hailed as one of the newer rising good bands of the country."
TitMainTitle: Vocalist Tiny Irvin wearing dress with musical notes, performing with Walt Harper band, including drummer Harold "Brushes" Lee, Jon Morris on trombone, Marion "Boonie" Hazel on trumpet, Nate Harper on baritone saxophone, Billy Lewis on bass, and Walt Harper on piano, with mural in background inscribed "Asbestos"
